column2: Simple feature collection with 4835 features and 14 fields
Projected CRS: OSGB36 / British National Grid
# London data includes all Tesco, census and journey time data. For the journey time data,
# food_pt, food_cycling, food_car are from 2015 and food_walk is from 2019
# Join london data to the shape file, so that all data corresponds with a particular LSOA
london_poly <- inner_join(map_lsoa,london_data) #joining by lsoa_code and lsoa_name
